graph_title: Children who return to relatives from orphanages (aged 0-17 years)
indicator_name: Children who return to relatives from orphanages (aged 0-17 years)
national_indicator_description: The number of children returned to relatives from orphanages at the age of 0-17
computation_definitions: Social service organizations for the elderly and disabled and orphanages are medical and social institutions intended for the permanent residence, household and medical care for the adults in need of care, the disabled and children.
computation_calculations: Number of children returned to relatives from orphanages.
